job.title: Site Reliability Engineer - Elk Grove, CA / Austin or Dallas TX / Denver, CO / Seattle, WA
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brSeeking an experienced SRE responsible for engineering upkeep and automation of internet scale loadbalancing and proxy servicesbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brStrong knowledge of TCP HTTP DNS and SSL protocolsbrbrExperience with distributed systems in a production operations environmentbrbrSystems configuration management experience with automation tools such as Puppet Chef Ansible or SaltbrbrExperience with programming andor scripting languages Python Perl Java bash RubybrbrSystems monitoring experience with tools such as Nagios Sensu Zabbix graphitebrbrExperience with devops tools processes and culturebrbrExperience with microservicescloud platforms such as Kubernetes a plusbrbrStrong communication skills and ability to work effectively across multiple business and technical teamsbrbrTroubleshooting of traffic flows at a deep level to find anomalies and to optimize performancebrbrDemonstrated ability to deliver results on time with high qualitybrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brThe Edge Traffic Delivery SRE team is a core engineering group with a mission of providing massively scaled loadbalancing and proxy solutions to many of Apples best known services  We are passionate about design implementation and support of our cuttingedge products  In addition to traffic engineering we often work with encryption technologies monitoringalerting cloud computing automation etc  brbrbrWe are looking for a motivated devOps engineer who can work with internal customers then ultimately engineer deliver and maintain sophisticated solutions  Come join us and see what it means to Think Differentbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS in Computer Science or equivalent experiencebrbr brRole Number 200227180brbr
